title: Only in Japan: The robot that's a smartphone that's a robot
text:
Only in Japan: The robot that's a smartphone that's a robot 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
RoboHon ("Robot Phone") is the cutest smartphone ever: a (familiar looking) robot frame that fits in your pocket. It can take calls, dance, ...
